docstring.long_description: When a constant is divided into an array or matrix, each element in the array or matrix will be divided by the constant value.
docstring.short_description: Find the remainder (division) of two numeric arrays, matrices, dataframes, or constants element-wise.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: The input that will be divided by b.

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: The input that will divide a.

returns.description:
OrderedPair if a is an OrderedPair.
x: the x-axis of input a.
y: the remainder of input a by input b.

Scalar if a is a Scalar.
c: the remainder of input a by input b.

Vector if a is a Vector.
v: the remainder of input a by input b.
